name: Reddit vs. Wallstreet! (Avatar Nick, Theoriginalchris1)
description:
Take on the Wallstreet hedge funds in this turn based RPG based on real life events from the January 2021 GameStop short squeeze!

Before playing, check out the comedic video on how the game was made!

Controls:

- Select Option: Enter / Space

- Change Option or Stage (Left): Left Arrow

- Change Option or Stage (Right): Right Arrow

- Click Buttons: Mouse Button (Left)
